author: wrowe
msg: Whoops... tangled path to BaseAddr.ref... fixed.

author: trawick
msg: Remove the mod_cgid-won't-go-away problem from the STATUS file.

author: trawick
msg: Use ap_note_subprocess() to register the mod_cgid daemon process for cleanup
so that it is killed at termination if it does not die when the parent gets
SIGTERM.  This change is to fix occasional problems where the process stays

author: rbb
msg: Update the perchild MPM.  At this point, it is possible to specify that
a child process runs as a specified user.  That child process is not
currently tied to a virtual host.  Using this MPM, I can launch Apache
and have it serve as both nobody and rbb.

author: sascha
msg: Don't bark at developers which are too lazy to pull down the htdocs
